text: Double Panharmonicon? Oh my god
I could definitely see Lifecrafter's Pokédex becoming a new EDH staple
I traded into one at the prerelease. It's pretty cheap right now, which is nice.
Is there a way to turn on notifications for slack? I'm not getting any. I just check in periodically and find that I've missed dozens of messages.
Click on the name of the channel you want notifications from and go to notifications
There might be a way to turn them on for everything but im not sure how
I think I got it  thanks.
Panharmonicon + Felidar Guardian == infinite blinks. So Decoction Module == infinite energy, Purphoros == infinite death...
Wait...missed 'another'
s/Panharmonicon/clone
Clone isn't an etb
No - it clones the Felidar which triggers ETB to blink clone etc.
Ah
I was replacing Pan with clone in the loop
Can do the same with Wispweaver/Resto Angel but that's much harder to cast and they only do creatures.
I think the Guardian is the first target permanent blink effect. Others do 'return at end of turn' effects vs the immediate blink (or flicker - whichever way you want to title immediate exile/return)
On an ETB
As far as permanents. Ghostly Flicker does a few other types.
Sure but that's an instant vs 'on a stick' where we can abuse it much more readily.
Ofc
:sunglasses:
Bond the Guardian to DEN and you've got a Stew!
Add Panharmonicon and you can infinite blink so long as you have a mana rock to blink that produces 2 colored mana.
Gets dirty fast.
Say...blink a Reflector Mage?
Gross
:smiling_imp:
Bounce 'em 2 at a time!
Always fun to bounce commanders with old Reflecty
is there a way to mark up your commander for an article? I'm not sure if I see a specific way to do it in the style guide, it's mentioned it should be seperate, but I don't see a specific tag for it
ahhhh, I thought I saw that somewhere, but couldn't remember where, thanks!
are the tags case sensitive?
No
sweet, that saves me time from changing what I just typed without thinking
Yeah I just copied and pasted my list out of tapped out then reordered them
that is basically what I'm doing right now
Is that just a different way of doing the [card]d[/card] tag?
so, I think the [card] tag is for when you're in paragraph, that way you can get it linked up to the specific card call
when you're doing a decklist, or a card list, you do the catagories
Okay
at least that's what I would do if I programmed it, without putting more thought into it or trying it out myself
how does Panharmonicon + Felidar Guardian equal infinite blinks. Am I missing a third card?
It doesn’t - Felidar Guardian + Clone == infinite blinks
Ahhhh :D yeah that's sweet.
If Felidar’s text didn’t say ‘another target permanent’ THEN  old Panny gives you infinite blinks
Still, being able to blink 2 things at once is twice as nice :wink:
at least they caught that trick before pushing it out the door
can you imagine trying to interact with the stack on mtgo with it? just sounds gross
It’s broken enough as it is...
Summary Dismissal is a thing
I like to imagine we live in a world where it doesn't, because it ruins all my fun.
Surprised more folks didn’t play it against Emrakul
I know, right? I guess four mana in standard is asking for a lot
This isn’t Modern...
hm. How do you upload the avatar for the wordpress through gravatar? Should I use a second wordpress account and somehow connect it to the one we use for edhrec's?
No
that's what I figured, hm
just to make sure I don't just post something on accident, I make a new post, do the check list stuff,  save the draft, then hit submit for review?
Yep.
You don't have the ability to publish
I Iiterally idiot-proofed it
I figured as much, but it's better to check than to do it on accident
Well, maybe not since half of the pending articles are saved as drafts and not properly submitted for review
Oh and dont forget to 'donate' to either Jas
Or mine PayPal account. <wink>
My 2 finished were submitted correctly yes?
Off to Two/Headed Giant draft with my son n
Just want to make sire
Sure
Only a nerd would ask that. Come on
I can live with that
Lol
I've been called worse
I'm a teaching assistant for a kindergarten class in a low income area, I got no money to donate to anything besides my edh decks
patrick: not sure if this is what you were asking, but the tags like `[Creature]` and `[Planeswalker]` actually are case-sensitive.
aha, alright, will fix that right now then
Do I have access to the WordPress account, then? Should I copy and paste my article in there?
Do you not?
I sent you an email telling you how to log on
Ah, yes. I haven't tried yet.
It's been a very busy few days.
Lmfao
I'm hoping that everything dies down at work and I'm able to check that out and get a head start on the next one.
remember to check the spam filter, that's where I found my wordpress invite

Jason, I'm digging through my email, I don't see where it talks about getting into WordPress. I see the style and submission guide, the writer's guide, and the email out to everyone, but I'm not seeing the WordPress info on any of those.
I may be blind, though. Am I just missing it?
WordPress sent you the credentials, not me
Check spam. Or someone give him the pw reset page?
I'll check spam
I still have no idea how to update my avatar using the wordpress gravatar thing, I've set up an account with gravatar but it dosen't seem to have been pushed to the wordpress stuff
Sometimes it takes time to load over I know it did for me
alrighty, will wait before I panic
